Class CalendarModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.CalendarModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CalendarModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    A representation of a calendar of events
    Author:
    Jessica Coan
